thread.title: Karnataka Budget Live: From Rs 5 breakfast to free water, CM Siddaramaiah presents Rs 1.82 l akh crore populist budget
thread.title_full: Karnataka Budget Live: From Rs 5 breakfast to free water, CM Siddaramaiah presents Rs 1.82 l akh crore populist budget

author: FE Online
title: Karnataka Budget Live: From Rs 5 breakfast to free water, CM Siddaramaiah presents Rs 1.82 l akh crore populist budget
text:
India news Karnataka Budget Live: From Rs 5 breakfast to free water, CM Siddaramaiah presents Rs 1.82 l akh crore populist budget Karnataka Budget Live: From Rs 5 breakfast to free water, CM Siddaramaiah presents Rs 1.82 l akh crore populist budget This was in addition to the VAT of three per cent. In the same Budget, K'taka govt also allocated Rs 100 crore for setting up of Namma Canteens in Bengaluru, it'll provide breakfast for Rs.5, lunch/dinner for Rs.10. By: FE Online | Bengaluru | Updated: March 15, 2017 1:56 PM Karnataka had imposed 20 per cent hike in additional excise duty on Indian-made liquor for the 2015-16. (PTI) 
Karnataka budget is has given several sops in its populist budget. These include no VAT on hard beer and wine, free water to slum dwellers and and Namma canteen for the state. The sops also include free LPG service for 5 lakh families. While the reasons are not known, Karnataka had imposed 20 per cent hike in additional excise duty on Indian-made liquor for the 2015-16. K’taka govt has allocated Rs 100 crore for setting up of Namma Canteens in Bengaluru, it’ll provide breakfast for Rs.5, lunch/dinner for Rs.10. 
Details awaited:
